alert.note: Alert for East Slopes of the Oregon Cascades; Northern Blue Mountains of Oregon (Oregon) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Pendleton (Northeast Oregon and Southeast Washington)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued February 03 at 2:15PM PST until February 06 at 4:00AM PST by NWS Pendleton
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 4 AM SUNDAY TO 4 AM PST MONDAY ABOVE 3500 FEET... * WHAT...Snow expected above 3500 feet. Total snow accumulations of 4 to 8 inches. * WHERE...In Oregon, Northern Blue Mountains of Oregon and East Slopes of the Oregon Cascades. In Washington, Northwest Blue Mountains. * WHEN...From 4 AM Sunday to 4 AM PST Monday. * IMPACTS...Expect winter driving conditions. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...A winter storm is forecast to bring snow to the Cascade and Blue Mountain passes with the heaviest snowfall currently anticipated between 4 AM Sunday and 4 AM Monday PST. Expect lower accumulations of up to an inch along US-97 south of Bend.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1, or by visiting online at https://tripcheck.com for Oregon or https://wsdot.com/travel for Washington.

area.areaDesc: East Slopes of the Oregon Cascades; Northern Blue Mountains of Oregon
